description: The Queue kapp form which approvals related to this form should be created in (Kapp setting is used if not set here)
name: Approval Form Slug

description: Options are: Team Name, Individual Name or Manager
name: Approver

description: If the form has custom submission workflow for a given event, the name of the event (i.e. Created, Saved, Submitted...etc) should be listed as one of the attribute values
name: Custom Submission Workflow

description: The Discussion Id related to this form
name: Discussion Id

description: Name of the Notification Template to use when this forms submission is completed. (Defaults to Kapp setting when not set at the Form Level)
name: Notification Template Name - Complete

description: Name of the Notification Template to use when this forms submission is submitted. (Defaults to Kapp setting when not set at the Form Level)
name: Notification Template Name - Create

description: Team that owns and manages this service (Defaults to Kapp Attribute when not set here)
name: Owning Team

description: Number of days until service is expected to be fulfilled - Defaults to Kapp Attribute if not set here.
name: Service Days Due

description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Active
name: Statuses - Active

description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Cancelled
name: Statuses - Cancelled

description: Submissions with a status value included in this attribute will be considered Inactive
name: Statuses - Inactive

description: User to assign tasks to when this form is submitted.
name: Task Assignee Individual

description: Team to assign tasks to when this form is submitted.
name: Task Assignee Team

description: The form to use when creating a fulfillment task for this item
name: Task Form Slug
